actionConfiguration.body: SELECT COUNT(*) from public.passenger;
SELECT COUNT(*) from public.passenger;

UPDATE public.passenger SET "first_name"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.first_name}}', "last_name"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.last_name}}', "email"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.email}}', "phone_number"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.phone_number}}' WHERE "passenger_id"= {{Table1.updatedRow.passenger_id}};

UPDATE public.passenger SET "first_name"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.first_name}}', "last_name"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.last_name}}', "email"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.email}}', "phone_number"= '{{Table1.updatedRow.phone_number}}' WHERE "passenger_id"= {{Table1.updatedRow.passenger_id}};

INSERT INTO public.passenger ("first_name","last_name","email","phone_number") VALUES ('{{(Table1.newRow || {}).first_name}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).last_name}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).email}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).phone_number}}')

INSERT INTO public.passenger ("first_name","last_name","email","phone_number") VALUES ('{{(Table1.newRow || {}).first_name}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).last_name}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).email}}','{{(Table1.newRow || {}).phone_number}}')

insert into passenger
(passenger_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number)
values
({{passenger_id.text}}, {{first_name.text}}, {{last_name.text}}, {{email.text}}, {{phone_number.text}});

insert into passenger
(passenger_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number)
values
({{passenger_id.text}}, {{first_name.text}}, {{last_name.text}}, {{email.text}}, {{phone_number.text}});

delete from passenger
where passenger_id = {{passenger_id_del.text}};

delete from passenger
where passenger_id = {{passenger_id_del.text}};

select flight.flight_id,
       flight.flight_number,
			 a1.airport_id as "departure id",
       a1.code as departure,
			 a2.airport_id as "arrival id",
       a2.code as arrival,
       flight.departure_time,
       flight.arrival_time,
       flight.capacity
from flight
left join airport a1 on departure_airport_id = a1.airport_id
join airport a2 on arrival_airport_id = a2.airport_id;

select flight.flight_id,
       flight.flight_number,
			 a1.airport_id as "departure id",
       a1.code as departure,
			 a2.airport_id as "arrival id",
       a2.code as arrival,
       flight.departure_time,
       flight.arrival_time,
       flight.capacity
from flight
left join airport a1 on departure_airport_id = a1.airport_id
join airport a2 on arrival_airport_id = a2.airport_id;

insert into flight
(flight_id, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time, capacity,
 departure_airport_id, arrival_airport_id)
values
({{flight_id.text}}, {{flight_number.text}}, {{departure_time.selectedDate}}, {{arrival_time.selectedDate}}, {{capacity.text}},
 {{departure_airport_id.text}}, {{arrival_airport_id.text}});

insert into flight
(flight_id, flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time, capacity,
 departure_airport_id, arrival_airport_id)
values
({{flight_id.text}}, {{flight_number.text}}, {{departure_time.selectedDate}}, {{arrival_time.selectedDate}}, {{capacity.text}},
 {{departure_airport_id.text}}, {{arrival_airport_id.text}});

delete from flight
where flight_id = {{flight_id_del.text}};

delete from flight
where flight_id = {{flight_id_del.text}};

select
    reservation.reservation_id,
    passenger.first_name,
    passenger.last_name,
    reservation.seat_number,
    reservation.status
from reservation
join passenger on reservation.passenger_id = passenger.passenger_id
where flight_id = {{flight_id_detail.text}};

select
    reservation.reservation_id,
    passenger.first_name,
    passenger.last_name,
    reservation.seat_number,
    reservation.status
from reservation
join passenger on reservation.passenger_id = passenger.passenger_id
where flight_id = {{flight_id_detail.text}};
select * from flight_reservation_summary;
select * from flight_reservation_summary;

update flight
set flight_number = {{flight_number.text}},
		departure_time = {{departure_time.selectedDate}},
		arrival_time = {{arrival_time.selectedDate}},
		capacity = {{capacity.text}},
 		departure_airport_id = {{departure_airport_id.text}},
		arrival_airport_id =  {{arrival_airport_id.text}}
where flight_id = {{flight_id.text}};

update flight
set flight_number = {{flight_number.text}},
		departure_time = {{departure_time.selectedDate}},
		arrival_time = {{arrival_time.selectedDate}},
		capacity = {{capacity.text}},
 		departure_airport_id = {{departure_airport_id.text}},
		arrival_airport_id =  {{arrival_airport_id.text}}
where flight_id = {{flight_id.text}};
